name: brace
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: brace
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: something that is used to support or connect things, or to make something stronger

example.eg: He was recently fitted with a brace for his bad back.
example.egtrans: 他最近因背部受伤戴了一个支撑架。

trans_examp.trans_en: a set of connected wires that is attached to a person's teeth in order to make them straight

example.eg: I had to wear a brace for my crooked teeth when I was a teenager.
example.egtrans: 十几岁时我不得不给我的畸形齿上戴上牙箍。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a pair of narrow straps that stretch from the front of the trousers over your shoulders to the back to hold them up
metal supports that are fastened to the legs of people who have difficulties with walking
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: （固定在腿部，协助行走的）腿部金属支撑物

dsense.name: brace
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: two things of the same type, especially two wild birds that have been killed for sport or food
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指猎获的野鸟的）一双，一对

name: brace
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: brace
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to support an object in order to stop it from falling down

example.eg: The side wall of the old house was braced with a wooden support.
example.egtrans: 老房子的边墙用木结构加固了。

dsense.name: brace
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to prepare yourself physically or mentally for something unpleasant
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: （为困难或坏事）使防备；使作准备

example.eg: The passengers were told to brace themselves (= to press their bodies hard against something or hold them very stiff) for a crash landing.
example.egtrans: 乘客们被告知要做好迫降准备。

example.eg: She told me she had some bad news for me and I braced myself for a shock.
example.egtrans: 她说有坏消息要告诉我，我已做好了承受打击的准备。
